intro_header: Watch the film and answer the questions along the way.

intro_text:
Besides what the actors say and do in a film, much is told through the use of costumes and props.
Each question has only one correct answer.

events.tekst:
Costume gives information both about the historical and social setting of the the character and it is often a hint to a character’s personality.
Props can be many different things and have different levels of importance.
The most important props become symbols of a character or a conflict that is important to the plot of the film.
It is important to pay attention to set, costume and props when we want to understand how the film works and what it wants to say.
svar: The pressure cooker is not typical of an American kitchen and clearly ties its owners to a culture that is different from the mainstream American.
The pressure cooker shows that this film is going to be about food and eating.
The pressure cooker does not have any particular meaning.
events.feedback: The opening shot of a film is always important and usually tries to give the audience an idea about what the film is going to be about

events.tekst: Consider the use of the pressure cooker as a prop? What could be reasons to show this item?
svar: The pressure cooker is not typical of an American kitchen and clearly ties its owners to a culture that is different from the mainstream American.
The pressure cooker shows that this film is going to be about food and eating.
The pressure cooker does not have any particular meaning.
events.feedback: The opening shot of a film is always important and usually tries to give the audience an idea about what the film is going to be about

events.tekst: How much information are you able to get from looking at the set and the characters in this picture?
svar: The characters have recently arrived and are unable to keep their home clean
They have recently arrived and that they have ties to more than one country/culture, i.e. India and the US.
The characters  desperately want children and are moving out
events.feedback: The set of a film is carefully planned and is one of the ways a director can make the audience understand what the film is about.

events.tekst: Consider the man's costume, is he dressed as
svar: A mix between Indian (Sikh) and American
events.feedback: Costume gives information both about the historical and social setting of the the character and it is often a hint to a character’s personality

events.tekst: Why do you think we see this symbol in the car?
svar: It is just an ornament with no particular meaning
It is a religious symbol that shows us the couple’s faith (which is different from mainstream Americans’)
It is there because the car smells bad
events.feedback: Symbols, whether they are well-known and easy to recognize or unique to the film, are a good way of communicating a lot of meaning without words

events.tekst: The T-shirt becomes an important prop, what is its function?
svar: It shows that the temperature is very high
It becomes a symbol of his need to do laundry
It becomes a symbol of him trying to be American
events.feedback: The T-shirt becomes both a prop and a symbol in this scene
